It's smaller than I thought it would be and fits comfortably in my hands.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, just buy extra batteries!
Reviews.Author: racecoar
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace my Olympus Tough (not sure which model). This is larger in width, leangth and weight. However, not buy a huge amount. I thought it took the same size batteries (they fit inside but did not work). The camera mode shoots 1080p x 60 frames, which is really clear HD. That does however eat battery time. The pictures are 16mp which is 2mp higher than my last camera (good). It also has a wifi function, haven't quite figured that out yet. I plan on submersing the camera soon to see if it lives up to its 53ft depth rating. But so far so good.

Reviews.Title: GOOD UNDER OVER WATER
Reviews.Author: yourklaus "THANKS"
Reviews.Content: ZOOM IS VERY BAD! As well the battery life when taking pictures not filming is short way to short might be returning. had to plug it in several times in a one day period I think it might be my battery we will see!

Reviews.Title: good CAMERA
Reviews.Author: TONY T.
Reviews.Content: excellent camera, NICE  GOOD TO TRAVEL TO ASIA , CAMERA IT CAN WORK UNDER RAINY. GOOD FOR OUT DOOR. BUY NOW YOU WILL LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: Still Trying To Figure It Out ... Very Poor App
Reviews.Author: KKZ
Reviews.Content: This camera replaces an underwater camera that I had since the 90s, it worked wonderfully, but it used APS film.Of course the tech in this camera is amazing, I'm still learning, (have not yet tried it in the water) BUT the Fuji iPhone App to use the Wi-Fi feature ... one of the key reasons I bought this camera is HORRIBLE. It will not work on my iPhone and only very slowly on my iPad and is shockingly cumbersome.Plus in only days since I bought this camera on Amazon the price has dropped ~$11.Unless you have a water related vacation is tomorrow, hold off on this camera, clearly there may be more price drops ahead and if Wi-Fi is important to you Fuji must do something to improve their pitiful app.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected, at all
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Disappointing, will be back in the market for a good camera....Second go around with Fuji, love the bikes :)

Reviews.Title: This is an Ok camera
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Good camera, I like the wifi but some pictures come out a little blury...not sure if I would buy this camera again

Reviews.Title: Needs refinement
Reviews.Author: PC
Reviews.Content: Bought for wifi access, the one thing it would not do constantly. Plus it was a little too large for what it delivered

Reviews.Title: Malfunctioned on second day
Reviews.Author: John LaGrassa
Reviews.Content: The camera seemed wonderful but it malfunctioned on the 2nd day and had to be returned.  The design seemed great.

Reviews.Title: Black dot shows up in pictures
Reviews.Author: Chelle
Reviews.Content: Received camera, charged battery and then turned on. See a black dot that shows up in pictures. Made sure this is not something on the exterior of the camera, and it is not. Will be returning this camera today.

Reviews.Title: Average To Date.
Reviews.Author: Rod Muilenburg
Reviews.Content: I honestly haven't had a single problem to date. The wireless Synch picture transfer works well with my phone for Customer Masonry Construction progress reports. I rarely offer a five star rating until I put the phone through it's paces.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: laollis
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to get this camera. I read all the reviews I could find and thought this one was just what I was looking for. Only one week and I knew I made a mistake. It seemed complicated, and sometimes when I'd turn it on and go to take a photo, it would just freeze. I couldn't take a picture or even turn it off.

Reviews.Title: Returned Product
Reviews.Author: Lance F Hagenbuch
Reviews.Content: The camera was missing items and appeared to have been previously opened.  As a result, I returned the product to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: queja
Reviews.Author: raul rojas
Reviews.Content: my camera does not buy it a lot and I came damaged .. focused not had to send it to repair that did not serve me

ProductInfo.Features:
Four proof protection for use in extreme conditions (Waterproof to 50 ft., Shockproof to 6.6 ft., Freeze proof to 14F and Dustproof)
Bright and clear 3.0-inch LCD display (920k dot)
16 million effective pixels 1/2.3-inch CMOS image sensor for fast performance, even in low light
Fujinon 5x optical zoom lens
Full HD movie 1080P
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix XP200 Blue 16MP Waterproof Digital Camera with 3-Inch LCD (Blue)
